channel.name: Comet US
channel.title: Grimm
channel.desc: Hank and Wu discover a way to stop Renard; Adalind gets a phone call that puts her in the middle of everything; Monroe and Rosalee get a demonstration of Diana's power; Eve and Trubel work on the mystery of the cloth and the healing stick.

channel.name: Comet US
channel.title: Grimm
channel.desc: Nick devises a plan that will take Capt. Renard out of his element; Adalind and Monroe attempt to keep the plan on track; Eve and Rosalee race to get the spell ready in time.
